title: Any thoughts on current state of CC Chains?
body:
I understand chain cc'ing is a hallmark of MOBA's, an actual skill to be worked on and perfected, and can be the only way of killing a super fed opponent or mega tank.

However, when you're behind as melee with little to no gap close, the game can be completely miserable to play because one missed step more than likely ends up in a kill for the enemy team, further snowballing them.

With the return of shutdown gold bonuses, have you guys ever thought about a buff for players who are doing poorly? Like an extra tenacity or ms buff that would be lost upon getting a kill/tower/large amount of assists?

Asking for a friend, i never do poorly.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

replies.body: rewarded for falling behind...... hmmmm i dont think that will ever be a thing unless you consider bounty gold the only thing.
